catalog_script_client.name: thirdtime

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_f4b929af83b12210def956d6feaad3a6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request Loaner Vehicle">b55ad03283692210def956d6feaad376</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:e52e507683692210def956d6feaad3ae</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>thirdtime</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
  if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
    g_form.setValue('vehicle_make', '');
    g_form.setValue('vehicle_model', '');
    g_form.setValue('vehicle_year', '');
    return;
  }

  var ga = new GlideAjax('VehicleTest');
  ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getVehicleDetails');
  ga.addParam('sysparm_vehicle_sys_id', newValue);
  ga.getXMLAnswer(function(response) {
    try {
      var data = JSON.parse(response);
      g_form.setValue('vehicle_make', data.make);
      g_form.setValue('vehicle_model', data.model);
      g_form.setValue('vehicle_year', data.year);
    } catch (e) {
      console.error('VehicleTest JSON parse failed:', e);
    }
  });
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-06-04 01:21:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f4b929af83b12210def956d6feaad3a6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>thirdtime</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory" source="x_1474716_lva">380367a183a12210def956d6feaad394</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory">380367a183a12210def956d6feaad394</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_f4b929af83b12210def956d6feaad3a6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-04 01:21:43</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
